# Customer Feedback Rating using SpaCy

## Introduction
We implemented an NLP model using SpaCy to classify customer feedback on car prices into ratings from 1 to 5.

## Dataset
The dataset contains text feedback and corresponding ratings (1 to 5).

## Steps

### 1. Data Preparation
- Loaded customer feedback data.
- Preprocessed the data using SpaCy to create training and testing sets.


<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:580/1*VzhvZVKGVGynlsU0AZZQww.jpeg"/>

### 2. Model Training
- Configured a text classification model using SpaCy.
- Trained the model on the preprocessed dataset.
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"/>


### 3. Evaluation
- Evaluated the model's performance on the test data.
- Generated a classification report to assess accuracy and other metrics.

## Results
The model achieved high accuracy in predicting the ratings, with all predicted ratings matching the true ratings in the test set.

The SpaCy-based NLP model effectively classifies customer feedback into ratings. This approach can help automate feedback analysis for businesses.

## Future Work
- Expand the dataset with more diverse feedback.
- Experiment with different model configurations and parameters.
- Deploy the model for real-time feedback analysis.
